alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 18 at 3:05PM PDT until April 19 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: Corrected IMPACTS for ORZ003 & 004. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow above 2000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy winds with falling snow may reduce visibility at times. Because precipitation is showery, there will likely be variations in snowfall amounts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
